short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Transforms your text into code that can only be understood by users with the key.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Keylang transforms your text into code that can only be understood by users with the key.

Defend your online content by encrypting any text, message, or comment you post online. Prevent bots and platforms from reading your content for data collection, indexing, or AI training purposes.

Keylang is a non-profit and open source project that aims to offer more privacy options to the users when posting content online.
